attributes.action: STOP SALE OF FLAMMABLE LIQUIDS ON AIRCRAFT
attributes.additional_details:
Types of Alcohol carried or sold in the aircraft cabin could be used as a weapon.
Stringent safety controls are applied when using aircraft for transportation, including controls of fluids that have safety related issues... But Alcohols are not included in these controls and could readily be used by terrorists/criminals seeking to cause damage or injury.
Please support this petition.
